title: Pachia Ammos Minoan Cemetery
description: Minoan cemetery located on a sandy beach in use from very early times until the Late Minoan period.

properties.description: Point based on an OpenStreetMap node representing the location of the modern village of Pachia Ammos, from which the Minoan burial site Pachia Ammos gets its name.
properties.title: OSM location of Pachia Ammos (modern)
